name: Time Bomb (Clearstar Softechnologies)
overview: THE WORLD USE TO BE SAFE... After your boss, Dr. Dewright, invented the ultimate bomb disarming rocket and thwarted the dastardly plans of terrorists world wide including putting the evil genius "THE MAD BOMBER" behind bars. BUT THAT WAS THEN AND THIS IS NOW... Now "THE MAD BOMBER" has escaped, kidnapping Dr. Dewright and hiding him somewhere in the building. The real problem is the time bomb ticking on the top floor and the booby traps lining the way to the top. Traps that would be fatal to the robot, like high pressure water cannons, megawatt electric door knobs, and whatever else the evil genius may have concocted. ONE LAST, LITTLE DETAIL... As the world is counting on you to control the robot to the top, since you worked with the Dr., you're perfect for the job, right? (if the only knew that you merely Dr. Dewright's janitor...)
